mapper.insert: insert into bu.wq_online_event_member (online_event_id, member_id, action, action_time) values (#{onlineEventId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
